Base oil SN70.title: Base oil SN70
Base oil SN70.subtitle: High-quality industrial base oil with multiple applications
Base oil SN70.description: Yellow Base Oil is a versatile lubricant base stock known for its high viscosity index, excellent oxidation stability, and suitability in extreme temperature conditions. It is widely used in automotive, industrial, and marine lubrication formulations.
usesdescription: Used in manufacturing of automotive engine oils and gear oils.
Essential for blending hydraulic fluids and industrial lubricants.
Utilized in transformer oils for power and electrical insulation.
Serves as a base for rust preventives and process oils.
Used in grease formulations for machinery and heavy equipment.
